info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:59PM MDT until August 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL ADA...WESTERN ELMORE AND CENTRAL OWYHEE COUNTIES... At 358 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oreana, or 33 miles west of Mountain Home, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Oreana around 410 PM MDT. Big Foot Butte around 430 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
